articles.author: Jennifer Maas
articles.title: ‘House of the Dragon’ Hits Season 2 High as 8.1 Million Viewers Watched Fiery Episode 4 Battle - Variety
articles.description: "House of the Dragon" drew 8.1 million viewers across HBO and Max in the U.S. for its fourth episode of Season 2 on Sunday, just besting the premiere.
articles.content:
“House of the Dragon” drew 8.1 million viewers across HBO and Max in the U.S. for its fiery fourth episode of Season 2 on Sunday, just besting the audience size for the premiere last month.

articles.title: WWE RAW 7/8/2024: 3 Things We Hated And 3 Things We Loved - Wrestling Inc.
articles.description: On a night that saw the righteous return of Rhea Ripley, here are three things we hated and three things we loved about the 7/8/24 episode of &#34;WWE Raw.&#34;
